products.name: Canon EOS 200D II 24.1MP Digital SLR Camera + EF-S 18-55mm f4 is STM Lens (Black) 1
products.description: The Canon EOS 200D II (also known as the Rebel SL3) is a compact, lightweight DSLR camera designed for beginners and enthusiasts. Equipped with a powerful 24.1MP APS-C CMOS sensor, the camera delivers stunning image quality and is perfect for both still photography and video recording. Paired with the versatile EF-S 18-55mm f/4 IS STM Lens, this camera is your go-to tool for capturing everyday moments, travel photography, and creative content. With its intuitive interface, advanced features, and 4K video capabilities, the Canon EOS 200D II is perfect for those looking to step up their photography game.

products.name: Canon EOS 1500D 24.1 Digital SLR Camera (Black) with EF S18-55 is II Lens 2
products.description: The Canon EOS 1500D is an entry-level DSLR camera that delivers exceptional image quality and ease of use for beginners and photography enthusiasts. With a 24.1MP APS-C CMOS sensor and Canon’s advanced DIGIC 4+ image processor, this camera allows you to capture stunningly detailed images and Full HD videos. Paired with the EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens, the EOS 1500D provides versatile performance for shooting a wide range of subjects, from landscapes to portraits. Its lightweight design, built-in Wi-Fi, and user-friendly controls make it the perfect companion for capturing everyday moments.

products.name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 9 Instant Camera (Cobalt Blue) 1
products.description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 9 is a fun, compact, and easy-to-use instant camera designed for capturing life's spontaneous moments. Available in the vibrant Cobalt Blue color, this stylish camera prints credit card-sized photos instantly, making it perfect for parties, travel, and everyday adventures. The Instax Mini 9 comes with user-friendly features, such as a built-in selfie mirror, automatic exposure adjustment, and a close-up lens attachment, ensuring that every photo is perfectly framed and beautifully exposed. Capture memories, share them on the spot, and enjoy the nostalgic charm of instant photography with the Instax Mini 9.

products.name: Nikon D780 DSLR Body with 24-120mm VR Lens, 3X Optical Zoom, Black 1
products.description: The Nikon D780 is a high-performance DSLR that bridges the gap between still photography and videography, making it an excellent choice for both professionals and enthusiasts. Equipped with a 24.5MP full-frame sensor and the EXPEED 6 image processor, this camera delivers stunning image quality, excellent low-light performance, and versatile shooting capabilities. Paired with the NIKKOR 24-120mm f/4G ED VR lens, the D780 offers impressive zoom capabilities with built-in Vibration Reduction (VR), ensuring sharp, blur-free images across a variety of shooting conditions. Whether you’re shooting landscapes, portraits, or action shots, the Nikon D780 provides flexibility, speed, and reliability in a compact DSLR body.

products.name: Nikon D850 45.7MP Digital SLR Camera (Black) with AF-S Nikkor 24-120mm F-4G ED VR Lens and 64GB Memory Card 1
products.description: The Nikon D850 is a professional-grade DSLR camera that excels in both still photography and videography. With a 45.7MP full-frame BSI CMOS sensor, the D850 delivers ultra-high-resolution images with exceptional detail and color accuracy, perfect for commercial, landscape, portrait, and sports photography. Paired with the AF-S NIKKOR 24-120mm f/4G ED VR lens, the D850 offers versatile zoom capabilities, making it an excellent all-around lens for a wide range of shooting scenarios. The camera's EXPEED 5 image processor, ISO range of 64-25,600 (expandable to 102,400), and 4K UHD video recording capabilities allow you to capture outstanding photos and videos, even in challenging lighting conditions. With a 64GB memory card included, you’ll have ample storage space for all your high-resolution files.

products.name: BoAt Rockerz 103 Pro Wireless Bluetooth Earphones
products.description: The boAt Rockerz 103 Pro is a feature-packed wireless Bluetooth earphone designed for music lovers who value convenience, comfort, and audio quality. Featuring Bluetooth 5.0, ASAP charge technology, and dynamic 10mm drivers, the Rockerz 103 Pro delivers a high-fidelity listening experience with powerful bass and clear highs. With up to 20 hours of battery life and magnetic earbuds for easy storage, these earphones are perfect for long listening sessions and active lifestyles. The lightweight and ergonomic design ensures all-day comfort, while voice assistant support allows for hands-free control.

products.name: BoAt Rockerz 400 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: The boAt Rockerz 400 is a lightweight and durable wireless Bluetooth headphone that offers powerful bass and an immersive sound experience. Designed to provide ultimate comfort, these headphones feature soft ear cushions and an adjustable headband, perfect for extended listening sessions. With up to 8 hours of playback time and dual-mode functionality (wireless and wired), the Rockerz 400 delivers the best of both worlds. Whether you're commuting, working out, or relaxing at home, the boAt Rockerz 400 lets you enjoy your music without any interruptions.

products.name: BoAt Rockerz 450 Batman DC Edition Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: The boAt Rockerz 450 Batman DC Edition is a special edition Bluetooth headphone designed for Batman fans and music lovers alike. Featuring the iconic Batman theme, these headphones deliver an immersive audio experience with powerful 40mm dynamic drivers and superior sound clarity. With up to 15 hours of playback time, lightweight design, and dual-mode functionality (wireless and wired), the Rockerz 450 Batman DC Edition ensures that you enjoy your favorite tunes in style, whether you're on the go or at home. Its sleek and ergonomic build offers maximum comfort for long listening sessions while letting you flaunt your fandom with the legendary Batman logo.

products.name: BoAt Rockerz 558 Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphones
products.description: The boAt Rockerz 558 wireless Bluetooth headphones are designed for those who seek a powerful audio experience with the comfort of over-ear design. Equipped with 50mm dynamic drivers, these headphones deliver immersive sound with deep bass and crisp highs. The Rockerz 558 boasts up to 20 hours of playback time, ensuring you stay connected to your music all day long. With its sleek, ergonomic build, including cushioned ear cups and adjustable headband, these headphones provide lasting comfort during extended listening sessions. Dual-mode functionality allows for seamless transition between wireless and wired use, giving you the flexibility to keep enjoying your tunes even when the battery runs low.

products.name: BoAt TRebel Rockerz 450 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: The boAt TRebel Rockerz 450 is a stylish and empowering wireless Bluetooth headphone designed exclusively for women who embrace their individuality. These lightweight, ergonomically designed headphones provide an immersive audio experience with powerful 40mm dynamic drivers, delivering clear sound with deep bass. With up to 15 hours of battery life and dual-mode functionality (wireless and wired), the TRebel Rockerz 450 ensures that your music goes wherever you do. The soft-cushion ear cups and adjustable headband offer lasting comfort, making them ideal for long listening sessions. Express your personality through bold design and superior sound quality.

products.name: Realme 7 Pro (Mirror Silver, 128 GB) (6 GB RAM)
products.description:
The realme 7 Pro in Mirror Silver is a premium mid-range smartphone that offers a balance of powerful performance, stunning display, and exceptional camera quality. Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 720G processor and backed by 6 GB of RAM, the realme 7 Pro delivers a smooth and efficient user experience whether you're gaming, multitasking, or streaming content. With its 6.4-inch Super AMOLED Full HD+ display, the phone provides vibrant colors and sharp details, making it perfect for media consumption. The 128 GB of internal storage gives you ample space for apps, media, and files, while the 4500 mAh battery with 65W SuperDart Charge ensures that you can recharge in no time, giving you a full charge in just 34 minutes.
The realme 7 Pro also features a 64 MP quad-camera setup with a Sony IMX682 sensor, allowing you to capture stunning photos in any lighting condition. Its 32 MP in-display front camera ensures crisp, clear selfies, and its stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos provide an immersive audio experience. Whether you're capturing memories, gaming, or binge-watching your favorite shows, the realme 7 Pro offers everything you need in a sleek and stylish package.

products.name: Realme 9 5G (Stargaze White, 128 GB) (6 GB RAM)
products.description:
The realme 9 5G in Stargaze White is a stylish and powerful smartphone designed to meet the demands of modern users. Equipped with 5G connectivity and powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor, the realme 9 5G offers blazing-fast performance and seamless multitasking. The phone features 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for all your apps, media, and files. The 6.5-inch Full HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate ensures a smooth and immersive viewing experience, making it ideal for gaming, streaming, and everyday use.

The 48 MP triple camera setup captures stunning photos and videos, while the 16 MP front camera is perfect for selfies and video calls. With a 5000 mAh battery, the realme 9 5G keeps you powered all day, and 18W fast charging ensures that you spend less time plugged in and more time enjoying your phone. The phone runs on realme UI based on Android, providing a clean and user-friendly interface.

products.name: Realme C25s (Watery Grey, 128 GB) (4 GB RAM)
products.description:
The realme C25s in Watery Grey is a budget-friendly smartphone offering reliable performance, long battery life, and ample storage. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 processor and featuring 4 GB of RAM, the realme C25s handles everyday tasks smoothly, from browsing to multitasking and gaming. With 128 GB of internal storage, this device provides plenty of space for apps, photos, and files. Its 6000 mAh battery ensures all-day power, perfect for users who need extended usage without frequent charging.

The realme C25s sports a 6.5-inch HD+ display for immersive viewing, and its 13 MP AI triple camera setup captures detailed photos in various lighting conditions. The 8 MP front camera ensures clear and sharp selfies. Running on realme UI 2.0 based on Android 11, the phone offers a smooth, user-friendly interface with enhanced security features like fingerprint and face unlock.

products.name: Realme GT 5G (Racing Yellow, 256 GB) (12 GB RAM)
products.description:
The realme GT 5G in Racing Yellow is a high-performance flagship smartphone built for speed and power. Equipped with the cutting-edge Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor and 12 GB of RAM, this phone delivers lightning-fast performance, ideal for gaming, multitasking, and high-intensity applications. The realme GT 5G features 256 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for apps, media, and files.

The stunning 6.43-inch Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate offers a smooth and immersive viewing experience, perfect for gaming and streaming. On the camera front, the 64 MP AI triple camera setup captures ultra-high-definition photos, while the 16 MP front camera ensures sharp and clear selfies. The 4500 mAh battery with 65W SuperDart fast charging keeps you powered up all day, delivering a full charge in just 35 minutes.

products.name: Realme Narzo 50A Prime (Flash Black, 64 GB) (4 GB RAM)

The 64 GB internal storage allows you to store your favorite apps, media, and files with ease, and it is expandable via a microSD card for additional space.

The 6.6-inch FHD+ display offers an immersive visual experience with vibrant colors and sharp details, perfect for media consumption and gaming. The 50 MP AI triple-camera setup captures stunning images with excellent clarity and detail, while the 8 MP front camera ensures sharp and bright selfies. Combining print, scan, and copy functions, this printer offers a practical solution for everyday tasks. With Canon FINE (Full-photolithography Inkjet Nozzle Engineering) technology, the MG2470 delivers high-quality prints with excellent color accuracy and sharp text. It’s easy to use, energy-efficient, and ideal for users who need reliable printing without taking up too much space. The printer’s sleek white and grey design complements any modern workspace.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X with Wraith Prism & RGB LED Cooler (100-100000071BOX) 3.6 GHz Upto 4.4 GHz AM4 Socket 8 Cores 16 Threads Desktop Processor (Silver)

Built on AMD’s Zen 2 architecture, the Ryzen 7 3700X delivers exceptional multi-threaded performance, making it perfect for intensive tasks like gaming, video editing, and 3D rendering. With a base clock speed of 3.6 GHz and a boost clock of up to 4.4 GHz, it provides fast and responsive performance for both single and multi-core tasks. It comes bundled with the Wraith Prism Cooler, which includes RGB LED lighting, ensuring efficient cooling while adding a touch of style to your setup.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT 3.9 GHz Upto 4.7 GHz AM4 Socket 8 Cores 16 Threads Desktop Processor (Silver)

Built on the advanced 7nm Zen 2 architecture, the Ryzen 7 3800XT offers 8 cores and 16 threads, making it highly efficient for multitasking, gaming, and content creation. With a base clock speed of 3.9 GHz and an impressive boost clock of up to 4.7 GHz, it provides fast and reliable performance for both single-threaded and multi-threaded workloads. The AM4 socket ensures compatibility with the latest motherboards and technologies like PCIe 4.0, enhancing system performance.

products.name: GIGASTAR 3.2 GHz LGA 1156 Intel Core i5-650 For H55 Motherboard 1st Generation Processor (Silver)

With Hyper-Threading technology, the processor delivers efficient multitasking capabilities by allowing each core to handle two threads simultaneously. The LGA 1156 socket ensures compatibility with H55 motherboards, making it a suitable upgrade for older systems.

products.name: Godrej 215 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer (Aqua Blue, RD UNO 2154 PTDI AQ BL)

This model comes equipped with a base drawer that allows for convenient storage of vegetables and other items that do not require refrigeration. products.name: Haier 195 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator (Prism Glass, HRD-1954CPG-E)

The Prism Glass design adds a modern and elegant look to your kitchen, blending perfectly with any decor.

products.name: LG 185 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator (Ebony Regal, GL-B199OERD)

The Ebony Regal design adds an elegant touch to your kitchen, offering both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

products.name: SAMSUNG 189 L Direct Cool Single Door 5 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer with Digital Inverter (Camellia Blue, RR21C2H25CU-HL)

The refrigerator also comes with a base drawer that offers additional storage for non-refrigerated items like potatoes and onions, keeping your kitchen organized and clutter-free.

products.name: Whirlpool 184 L Direct Cool Single Door 2 Star Refrigerator (Sapphire, 205 WDE PRM 2S SAPPHIRE BLOOM-Z)

With its large 50-inch screen and ultra-slim design, this TV is ideal for a modern living room setup, delivering an impressive combination of smart features, connectivity options, and superior performance.

products.name: iFFALCON by TCL F53 100 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV
products.description: The iFFALCON by TCL F53 40-inch Full HD LED Smart Android TV is designed to provide an immersive viewing experience with Full HD resolution and a wide range of smart features powered by Android 11. Whether you’re streaming your favorite shows, watching live sports, or gaming, the 40-inch display delivers vivid colors and sharp clarity. The TV also supports Dolby Audio, ensuring high-quality sound that complements the visuals. With Google Assistant, built-in Chromecast, and access to the Google Play Store, this TV is perfect for enhancing your home entertainment setup with a seamless and intuitive smart experience.

products.name: LG 123 cm (49 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart WebOS TV
products.description: The LG 49UK7500PTA is a feature-packed 49-inch Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV that combines stunning picture quality, smart connectivity, and powerful sound. Powered by WebOS, this TV offers an intuitive user interface and access to a wide variety of streaming apps and content. With Active HDR, 4K Upscaling, and Nano Cell Display technology, this TV ensures vivid colors and sharp details for an immersive viewing experience. Whether you're watching your favorite movies or gaming, the AI ThinQ™ technology allows seamless interaction with voice commands and smart home devices, elevating your home entertainment setup.

products.name: Mi 5A 100 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Audio (2022 Model)
products.description: The Mi 5A 40-inch Full HD LED Smart Android TV is designed to deliver an immersive entertainment experience with sharp visuals and rich audio. Powered by Android TV 11, this smart TV provides seamless access to a wide range of apps and streaming services. With Full HD resolution and Vivid Picture Engine, every frame is crisp and vibrant, while Dolby Audio ensures crystal-clear sound quality. The bezel-less design enhances the visual appeal, and the PatchWall interface offers easy access to curated content, making it a perfect addition to your living room.

products.name: SAMSUNG Q Series 163 cm (65 inch) QLED Ultra HD (4K) Smart Tizen TV (65Q7FN)
products.description: The Samsung Q Series 65-inch QLED Ultra HD (4K) Smart Tizen TV (65Q7FN) offers a superior viewing experience with its Quantum Dot technology, delivering vibrant colors, deep blacks, and exceptional brightness. Powered by Samsung’s Q Engine, the TV offers smooth and detailed visuals in 4K resolution. The Smart Tizen OS ensures a seamless, user-friendly interface, granting access to a wide array of apps and streaming services. Its sleek design combined with advanced features like Ambient Mode and One Connect Box allows it to blend into your living space effortlessly.

products.name: BoAt Cosmos Pro Smartwatch
products.description: The boAt Cosmos Pro is a feature-packed smartwatch designed for both fitness enthusiasts and tech-savvy individuals. With a sleek and premium design, the Cosmos Pro features a 1.78-inch AMOLED display that delivers crisp visuals, making navigation through the user interface smooth and enjoyable. Equipped with advanced health tracking features like heart rate monitoring, SpO2 tracking, and a sleep monitor, it helps you stay on top of your wellness. Additionally, the watch comes with a variety of workout modes to track your physical activity accurately. Offering Bluetooth calling, smart notifications, and seamless integration with the boAt Crest app, the Cosmos Pro is more than just a fitness tracker — it's a comprehensive lifestyle companion.

products.name: BoAt Storm Smartwatch
products.description: The boAt Storm Smartwatch is a stylish and feature-rich wearable that offers advanced health tracking and fitness monitoring for a wide range of users. With its sleek design, vibrant 1.3-inch color display, and durable build, the Storm is engineered for both everyday use and workout sessions. Equipped with essential health sensors like real-time heart rate monitoring, SpO2 (blood oxygen) tracking, and sleep tracking, this smartwatch is perfect for staying on top of your wellness goals. It also offers 9 sports modes for detailed fitness tracking, ensuring you can monitor various activities, from walking to yoga. Stay connected with smart notifications and customize your experience with multiple watch faces, all while enjoying up to 10 days of battery life.

products.name: BoAt Storm Call Smartwatch
products.description: The boAt Storm Call Smartwatch is designed for the modern user who needs seamless connectivity combined with advanced health tracking. Featuring Bluetooth calling, this smartwatch allows you to answer and make calls directly from your wrist, ensuring you stay connected even when you're on the move. The 1.69-inch HD color display enhances your viewing experience, offering crisp visuals and an intuitive touch interface. With its heart rate, SpO2, and sleep monitoring sensors, along with 10 sports modes, this smartwatch ensures comprehensive fitness tracking and wellness monitoring. Stay informed with smart notifications and enjoy the convenience of voice assistant support, all while benefiting from a long-lasting 7-day battery life.

products.name: BoAt Storm Pro Call Smartwatch
products.description: The boAt Storm Pro Call Smartwatch is the perfect fusion of style, functionality, and cutting-edge technology. Featuring Bluetooth calling, this smartwatch enables users to make and receive calls directly from their wrist, making everyday communication more accessible and hands-free. Its stunning 1.78-inch AMOLED display delivers vivid colors and sharp clarity, ensuring an immersive viewing experience. With advanced health monitoring capabilities, including heart rate, SpO2, and sleep tracking, it supports your overall well-being. Designed for fitness enthusiasts, the Storm Pro Call includes over 100 sports modes, helping you track and enhance your performance. The 7-day battery life ensures long-lasting usage without frequent recharges.

products.name: BoAt Storm RTL Smartwatch
products.description: The boAt Storm RTL Smartwatch is designed for those who want to lead an active and healthy lifestyle while staying connected. Featuring a 1.3-inch full-touch color display, this smartwatch provides an easy-to-use interface with vibrant visuals, perfect for tracking your health and fitness in real-time. With a range of health monitoring tools like 24/7 heart rate monitoring, SpO2 tracking, and guided breathing sessions, the Storm RTL ensures that your wellness is always a top priority. It also offers 9 active sports modes, helping you stay motivated and track your fitness progress across a variety of activities. The smartwatch is equipped with customizable watch faces and smart notifications, so you can personalize your experience while receiving alerts for calls, messages, and more.

The Canon EOS 5D is renowned for its excellent performance and versatility in a range of shooting scenarios. Whether you’re a professional photographer or an advanced hobbyist, the 5D’s full-frame sensor, fast autofocus system, and 4K video capabilities will elevate your work to new heights. With a rugged build and advanced features like built-in Wi-Fi, GPS, and superior low-light performance, the Canon EOS 5D is a powerful tool for creating stunning images and videos.

values.value: Enjoy smooth and accurate autofocus during both still photography and Full HD video recording, providing fast subject tracking and sharp focus.

values.value: Shoot stunning 4K UHD videos with full creative control, capturing rich details and vivid colors, ideal for vlogging, YouTube, and content creation.

values.title: EF-S 18-55mm f/4 IS STM Lens
values.value: A versatile zoom lens with image stabilization, making it perfect for everyday shooting, from wide landscapes to close-up portraits.

values.value: The fully articulating LCD screen makes it easy to compose shots from creative angles and is ideal for selfies and vlogging.

values.title: Creative Assist Mode
values.value: Simplifies the photography process with easy-to-use settings and visual guides for beginners, making it simple to achieve professional-looking results.

values.value: Weighing just 449g, this is one of the lightest DSLR cameras, making it convenient to carry on your travels or for daily use.

values.value: Seamlessly share your photos and videos via Wi-Fi or remotely control the camera using your smartphone through the Canon Camera Connect app.

The Canon EOS 200D II is the perfect camera for budding photographers and content creators. Its user-friendly design, powerful features like 4K video and Dual Pixel Autofocus, and compact size make it a versatile and portable option for travel, family photography, and vlogging. With built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and a fully articulating touchscreen, it’s designed for modern photographers who want both quality and convenience. The included EF-S 18-55mm f/4 IS STM Lens offers image stabilization and silent autofocus, making it an excellent choice for capturing both photos and videos with ease.

values.title: 24.1MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
values.value: Capture high-resolution images with rich details, accurate colors, and impressive sharpness, perfect for printing large photos or cropping without losing quality.

values.title: DIGIC 4+ Image Processor
values.value: Ensures fast image processing and enhances overall performance, delivering beautifully rendered images and smooth video recording.

values.title: ISO Range 100-6400 (Expandable to 12,800)
values.value: Shoot in various lighting conditions, from bright daylight to low-light environments, with minimal noise and clear results.

values.title: EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens
values.value: This versatile zoom lens is equipped with image stabilization to reduce camera shake, making it ideal for everyday shooting, from wide-angle landscapes to close-up portraits.

values.title: 9-Point Autofocus System
values.value: With 9 autofocus points and 1 cross-type point at the center, the autofocus system ensures sharp and accurate focus, even when the subject is off-center.

values.title: Full HD Video Recording (1080p)
values.value: Record high-quality Full HD videos at 30 fps, allowing you to capture memories in stunning detail with smooth playback.

values.title: Built-in Wi-Fi & NFC
values.value: Easily share your photos and videos via Wi-Fi or transfer them to your smartphone using NFC (Near Field Communication) for quick social media uploads.

values.title: Optical Viewfinder with 95% Coverage
values.value: Compose your shots with precision using the optical viewfinder, giving you a real-time view of the scene while conserving battery life.

values.title: Creative Filters
values.value: Experiment with a variety of creative filters, such as grainy B/W, soft focus, fisheye effect, and more, to enhance your images and express your artistic vision.
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens

The Canon EOS 1500D is an ideal DSLR for beginners who want to explore photography beyond their smartphones. Its powerful 24.1MP sensor, Full HD video recording, and easy-to-use interface make it a perfect first camera for aspiring photographers. The included EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens offers versatility, allowing you to capture everything from wide-angle shots to zoomed-in details. With built-in Wi-Fi and NFC, you can effortlessly share your creativity with the world. Whether you're shooting photos or recording videos, the Canon EOS 1500D offers reliable performance at an affordable price.

values.title: Instant Photos
values.value: Capture moments and print them instantly with credit card-sized prints (2.4 x 1.8 inches), perfect for sharing or keeping in your wallet.

values.title: Built-in Selfie Mirror
values.value: The small mirror next to the lens makes it easy to frame and take the perfect selfie every time.

values.title: Close-Up Lens Attachment
values.value: Snap detailed close-ups with ease using the included lens attachment, ideal for capturing subjects as close as 35 cm from the camera.

values.title: Automatic Exposure
values.value: The camera’s brightness adjustment dial automatically detects the best lighting setting for your environment, ensuring that your photos are properly exposed every time.

values.title: High-Key Mode
values.value: Enhance your photos with a soft, brighter look using the High-Key mode, which is perfect for portraits or when you want a more dreamy, vintage feel.

values.title: Retro Design
values.value: The Instax Mini 9’s sleek and retro-inspired design is not only stylish but also highly functional and easy to carry.

values.title: Simple Operation
values.value: Designed for all ages, the Instax Mini 9 features a simple point-and-shoot operation, making it perfect for anyone, including children and photography beginners.

The Fujifilm Instax Mini 9 is the perfect instant camera for capturing and sharing moments in an instant. Its easy-to-use design and fun features, like the selfie mirror and close-up lens, make it ideal for casual photographers, partygoers, and anyone who loves the retro charm of instant prints. Available in the striking Cobalt Blue color, it’s a stylish accessory that’s sure to stand out. Whether you're creating memories at events, parties, or on the go, the Instax Mini 9 delivers instant fun and creativity!

values.title: 24.5MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
values.value: Capture high-resolution images with excellent color accuracy, dynamic range, and detail, even in low-light environments.

values.title: EXPEED 6 Image Processor
values.value: Experience fast processing speeds and superior image quality, along with improved noise reduction and enhanced color reproduction.

values.title: Hybrid Autofocus System
values.value: Enjoy fast and precise autofocus with 51-point phase-detection and 273-point contrast-detection autofocus, providing sharp focus in both stills and video modes.

values.title: 4K UHD Video Recording
values.value: Record ultra-high-definition videos at 30 fps with full-pixel readout, giving you clear and vibrant video quality. The D780 also offers Full HD slow-motion recording up to 120 fps.

values.title: Dual UHS-II SD Card Slots
values.value: Expand your storage options with dual SD card slots, offering flexibility for back-up, overflow, or organized file management during long shoots.

values.value: This versatile zoom lens covers a wide focal range, making it ideal for everyday photography. Its 3X optical zoom and Vibration Reduction (VR) technology allow for steady, sharp images, even in challenging conditions.

values.title: 7 fps Continuous Shooting

values.title: Tilting 3.2-inch Touchscreen LCD
values.value: The large tilting LCD touchscreen makes it easy to shoot from a variety of angles and navigate the camera's settings with touch control.

values.title: Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
values.value: Seamlessly share your photos and videos via Nikon's SnapBridge app, or remotely control your camera from your smartphone or tablet.

The Nikon D780 combines the classic DSLR experience with cutting-edge features, making it the perfect tool for both photographers and videographers. Its 24.5MP full-frame sensor, 4K UHD video capabilities, and hybrid autofocus system ensure exceptional performance in any shooting scenario. Paired with the NIKKOR 24-120mm VR lens, this kit delivers sharp, stabilized images across a wide focal range. With dual card slots, excellent battery life, and robust weather sealing, the D780 is built for professionals who need reliability and versatility in the field.

values.value: Capture incredibly detailed and sharp images, even in low light, with the high-resolution 45.7MP sensor, which offers impressive dynamic range and minimal noise.
